attributes.action: No Referendum on leaving the EU
attributes.additional_details:
This petition calls for there to be no hockey cokey referendum on leaving the EU.

The United Kingdom is best served being with the EU and the Prime Minister should try to reform the EU as a whole with genuine negotiations for all of Europe which will help Britain and Europe which will therefore help the world as a whole.

There should not be an in/out/shake it all about referendum for our relationship with Europe.
